trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Spooner
There were no other sightings in Spooner on or around November 29th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was taking our three dogs for a walk down our drive way.I was headed west and say a large bright light off to my left.It was large and changing colors.I went back to the house as fast a possible to get my binocs and camera. went back out and watched it for a few more minn. then went in to the house and went up stairs to get a better look, as it was going out of sight. I knew it was a ufo when i first saw it,nothing casts a light like it did . it moved so slowly that it looked like it was standing still at first. Nothing could be that far away and be that big.The center was a large white ball shape that cast light off to its sides ,that must of been miles long.The light changed slowly, not like you see satellites at night change colors but slow.It just kept moveing w.sw. till it reached the tree line and i lost sight of it.MY feeling at the time were mixed.I knew that it was a ufo but my camera is a piece of crap. I text my friend in town to look for it . But she could not see it. I wass pissed ,becouse if i had taken the dogs out earlyer i would have gotten a better and longer look at it. And maybe I could have gotten on video like the last one i seen.
Summary: round sphere,white, that cast changing colors of light to the sides ,very slow
